about_the_game:
If you like this game, please add it to your wishlist~

About this game:

All materials in the game are genuine license

Summary of the plot:

"Gusin" is a traverser who came to another world by chance,
As soon as he landed, he was attacked by a skeleton dog and fought alongside a female swordsman.
And later rescued the seriously injured female swordsman "Odetta",
Then he met Nana, the daughter of the head of the Yaren village
Encountered the female boss of the pawn shop "Camilla" and her guard ninja "Mia",
During the robbery of the slave camp, I also met a like-minded partner "Kagura",
Solved one trouble after another, and started a happy harem life.

Character introduction:

Odetta：

A lone fighter with exquisite swordsmanship, he will no longer fight alone after encountering "Gusin"~

Nana：

The daughter of the head of the demi village, who is good at fighting

Anzac Camilla：

The female boss of the pawn shop, beautiful and mysterious

Mia：

The guard ninja of the female boss of the pawn shop, a rare elven clan, with strong combat effectiveness

Kagura：

The female ninja who helped out during the robbery of the slave camp has a special personality

Game features:

  • Go on an adventure with the protagonist and gain love on the way.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategies.
  • Various professions and unique skills, each profession has powerful nirvana.
  • The monsters who avoid by walking, choose to fight relatively freely.
  • Equipped with a synthesis system to make the game experience more interesting.

content_descriptors.notes:
- This game contains some sexual innuendos, depictions of kissing and flirting, and sexy and revealing clothing.
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

name: I open the harem in the last days

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card

short_description: What kind of experience is it to travel directly to a place like the end of the world? Fight, ambush, survive? No, no, of course, to start a "happy" harem life, full of wives and concubines~
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
